author: craigmcc
msg: If <template:get> or <template:insert> throw an exception, do not override
a nested exception already created by an included JSP page if it already
exists at the standard Action.EXCEPTION_KEY request attribute key.

author: craigmcc
msg: Make the context path prepend for a redirect performed by <logic:forward>
operate identically to the corresponding processing in ActionServlet when an
Action returns an ActionForward with the redirect flag set.
